Content Creator and Social Media Manager Job at Mshel Homes Limited




        
    

        
        Mshel Homes Limited is a real estate development and marketing company incorporated in 2018 with a unique vision to be the leading real estate company in Nigeria, with an outstanding reputation for honesty, integrity and impeccable customer service.

At Mshel Homes Limited our mission is to create a lifetime relationship with our clientele by deliverying property solutions through innovative and technological driven processes that caters to your real estate needs whilst adhering to the highest standards, systems and performance goals necessary to achieving your dreams.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator and Social Media Manager 
     

            
    



Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Summary 


	We are seeking a creative and results-driven Content Creator who is also a Social Media Manager to develop engaging content that enhances brand visibility, drives customer engagement, and promotes our real estate offerings
	The ideal candidate will create compelling digital content across various platforms, and manage our social media pages, blogs, websites, and run email campaigns.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and execute social media and content strategies aligned with marketing goals.
	Create and curate engaging content (text, images, videos, reels, blogs, infographics).
	Schedule and publish posts across multiple platforms (Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, TikTok).
	Monitor and engage with the audience (comments, messages, mentions).
	Analyze performance metrics and generate reports to optimize content.
	Manage paid social media ads, budgets, and track ROI.
	Collaborate with influencers, designers, and videographers for campaigns.
	Build and nurture an active online community to boost engagement.
	Stay updated on trends, tools, and best practices in social media and content marketing.
	Conduct competitor and market research to identify opportunities.
	Produce SEO-optimized content (blogs, website copy, listings) for better visibility.
	Develop email marketing content, newsletters, and CTAs to drive sales.
	Edit and optimize multimedia content for different platforms.
	Handle crisis management and address negative feedback professionally.
	Train and guide team members on social media and content best practices.


Key Requirements


	HND/BSc in Communications, Journalism, or related field.
	5 years of Proven experience in Content Creation, Social Media Management, or Digital Marketing (preferably in real estate).
	Strong writing, storytelling, and editing skills.
	Proficiency in video editing tools (e.g., Canva, Adobe Premiere Pro, CapCut).
	Knowledge of SEO, Google Analytics, and social media advertising.
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines.
	Creative mindset with strong attention to detail.


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
	Career growth and professional development opportunities.
	Work in a dynamic and innovative real estate company
	Access to exclusive investment and tools
	Positive work environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:  mshelrecruitment@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
